seasonal.translation[0].definitions[0].d: happening, expected, or needed during a particular season
seasonal.translation[0].definitions[0].e: seasonal jobs in the tourist industry
seasonal.translation[1].definitions[0].d: adjustments you make or changes that happen because of the situation during a particular period of the year, that is not typical of the rest of the year
seasonal.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Unemployment figures were down during the summer months, even after seasonal adjustment.
seasonal.translation[1].definitions[1].d: happening or needed only at a particular time of year
seasonal.translation[1].definitions[1].e: Thousands of agricultural laborers arrive to do seasonal work on American farms.
